text: Matador is a 1986 Spanish comedy-drama movie directed by Pedro Almodóvar and starring Antonio Banderas, Eusebio Poncela, Carmen Maura, Nacho Martínez, Assumpta Serna. ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 comedy-drama movies Category:1980s erotic movies Category:Spanish comedy movies Category:Spanish drama movies Category:Movies directed by Pedro Almodóvar Category:Movies set in Madrid
title: Matador (movie)
